sentences.en: a dismal, grey afternoon
sentences.cn: 一个阴沉灰暗的下午

sentences.en: a fit of the dismals.
sentences.cn: 一阵情绪低落。

sentences.en: A look of disbelief came into his eyes, but was quickly replaced by one of dismal surrender.
sentences.cn: 他眼里闪现出一丝怀疑，但又马上代之以可怜无助的依从。

sentences.en: He felt dismal after reading a piece of bad news in the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 他读了报上的一条不好的消息后心情忧郁.

sentences.en: Her scheme was a dismal failure .
sentences.cn: 她的计划彻底失败。

sentences.en: His reflections as he made his toilette were rather dismal.
sentences.cn: 在他梳装打扮的时候,他头脑里思绪万千,并不愉快.

sentences.en: In spite of a dismal record at school, she narrowly squeaked into design school.
sentences.cn: 尽管在学校的成绩很糟糕，她还是勉强进入了设计学校。

sentences.en: It was a dismal failure.
sentences.cn: 这是个让人沮丧的失败。

sentences.en: She works in a dismal little room in the attic.
sentences.cn: 她在阁楼上的一间阴暗的小房间里工作.

sentences.en: That is a rather dismal melody.
sentences.cn: 那是一支相当忧郁的歌曲.

sentences.en: The boy remained as dismal as a hearse.
sentences.cn: 那孩子仍然看上去像口棺材,死气沉沉.

sentences.en: The dismal story of ventures in other places is quickly told.
sentences.cn: 在其它几个地方的冒险很快就结束了,故事都很凄惨.

sentences.en: The future looks pretty dismal right now.
sentences.cn: 目前前景似乎相当暗淡。

sentences.en: The house is so antique and dismal that it depresses me dreadfully.
sentences.cn: 那所房子又古老,又阴惨惨的;我在那儿就闷得要死.

sentences.en: The main part of the hospital is pretty dismal but the children's ward is really lively.
sentences.cn: 医院的主体部分死气沉沉，但是儿科病房却充满生气。

sentences.en: The rain turned the snow to slush and made the mountain - side dismal.
sentences.cn: 雨使雪化成了雪水,搞得山边景色黯然无趣.

sentences.en: The singer gave a dismal performance of some old songs.
sentences.cn: 那歌手唱了几首老歌，唱得不怎么样。

sentences.en: The team’s record so far is pretty dismal.
sentences.cn: 该队到目前为止的成绩很糟糕。

sentences.en: We're dismal enough without conjuring up ghosts and visions to perplex us.
sentences.cn: 用不着招神现鬼来缠我们,我们已够惨的啦.

sentences.en: You can't occupy yourself with dismal thoughts all the time.
sentences.cn: 不要终日陷在阴郁的思绪中。

trans.tran_cn: 阴沉的，惨淡的，凄凉的，忧郁的
trans.tran_en: if a situation or a place is dismal, it is so bad that it makes you feel very unhappy and hopeless
